bug.author: huhubrave
bug.summary: [tune] Compatibility error with pytorch lightning1.0 's Callbacks
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Running<denchmark-link:https://docs.ray.io/en/master/tune/tutorials/tune-pytorch-lightning.html#tune-pytorch-lightning> the example</denchmark-link> in the link causes an error. When "TuneReportCallback" is added to pytorch lightningâ€˜s callbacks. Ray version and other system information (Python version, TensorFlow version, OS): ray v1.1.0.dev0 pytorch-lightning 1.0.3 <denchmark-h:h3>Reproduction (REQUIRED)</denchmark-h>
Please provide a script that can be run to reproduce the issue. The script should have (i.e., use fake or mock data / environments): <denchmark-link:https://docs.ray.io/en/master/tune/tutorials/tune-pytorch-lightning.html#tune-pytorch-lightning>https://docs.ray.io/en/master/tune/tutorials/tune-pytorch-lightning.html#tune-pytorch-lightning</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huhubrave>@huhubrave</denchmark-link> do you have the full stack trace that you are seeing? I'm not able to reproduce this on PTL v1.0.3.
Looks like this might be already fixed.
